data.title: Regina Hall Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Regina Hall on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Regina Hall including Vacation, Scary Movie, and more.
data.text:
Black Nanny

Bow persuades Dre to hire a nanny, and after several interviews that don't go well, they meet Vivian, who impresses them with her desire to take care of the whole family. Meanwhile, when Diane decides to run for class president, Zoey helps Diane create a smear campaign to win Diane the vote.

Super Rich Kids

When Dre meets Junior'sÂ cool friends, Dre is happy his son may have the opportunity for an actual social life. Meanwhile, Bow deals with Ruby, Zoey, Jack and Diane not confessing to things breaking around the house and decides to handle it her own way.

Manternity

Dre considers taking paternity leave after he realizes that Zoey is arguably the best child and their bond developed while he was unemployed when she was born. Meanwhile, Bow tries to hide her pregnancy in order to get a promotion, and Ruby convinces the kids that their nanny, Vivian, is stealing from them.

Airplane Showdown

An airline passenger has a standoff with a flight attendant, Shaboots and T-Ray deliver a lecture on women's periods, and a prayer group receives a visit from God.

Black Is the Same Old Black

Duane's shaky dealings with Boris' church were done in Tisha's name...so it's her name on the police warrant when cops arrive at her trunk show. But all of the wives get thrown in jail when they protest her arrest.
